Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2010 01:27AM emptysthemepark wrote: Update:  My results came back - after getting lost twice *eyeroll* - and the lump is being classed as a fibroadenoma.  However, while waiting, I've developed a new, equally large lump in my right breast, which I find concerning and upsetting. I've decided when I go in this week to request a lumpectomy.  I want to be absolutely sure and I just don't want to have these large, sometimes painful, lumps in me anymore. I should be relieved, and I am, somewhat, but the new lump just growing so fast freaks me out.  I have a feeling I won't relax until they do the biopsy.  Ugh. Anyway, reading through these forums was and is a wonderful help to me in feeling more informed and less alone, so thank you.  <3
Posts.Title: Found a large lump... Some advice during waiting game? emptysthemepark emptysthemepark

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2010 07:20PM emptysthemepark wrote: shadow2356 - Thank you.  I don't have anyone around me other than my stepmother and best friend who can say, Hey, mine was nothing scary.  I need to hear that it isn't always bad.  I'll be hoping for good things for you and your health. tami444 - Thank you, so so much.  You are not only incredibly brave, but also extremely helpful and kind.  I was told to hit a breast cancer forum for advice by another general women's health community, and they were right:  you've helped me sort out what the next steps should be, good or bad (had no idea that a sonogram might be on the table and that age made a difference!).  You're right about trying not to waste a moment worrying, to just worry when I know.  I think I'm touchy because every relative I've lost died of a form of cancer, the most recent just over a year ago.  I'm always just waiting for it to knock on my door, you know?   I try so hard not to worry.  When I'm with people, it's a lot easier to stay calm.  I tend to not want people to worry so I try to be strong around others.  I melted down with my boyfriend last night and he was super kind and supportive, just what I needed.  I've been home alone all day today and it's been awful.  I just suddenly cry out of fear.
Posts.Title: Found a large lump... Some advice during waiting game? emptysthemepark emptysthemepark
